string2Expr

public condor.classad.Expr string2Expr(java.lang.String string)
                                throws ClassAdUtilitiesException
This method transforms a String into a ClassAd expression. If the String does not represent a valid ClassAd expression a ClassAdUtilitiesException is raised.

Parameters:
string - - The String that has to be transformed into the ClassAd expression.
Returns:
- The ClassAd expression.
Throws:
ClassAdUtilitiesException

string2CompleteRecordExpr

public condor.classad.RecordExpr string2CompleteRecordExpr(java.lang.String string)
                                                    throws ClassAdUtilitiesException
This method transforms a String into a Complete ClassAd Record Expression. If the String does not represent a valid ClassAd expression a ClassAdUtilitiesException is raised. If the String does not contain a Rank and Requirements field, than standard Rank and Requirements are added by the invocation to the function completeClassAd. Requirements = true; Rank = 1.0;

Parameters:
string - - The String that has to be transformed into the Complete ClassAd Record Expression.
Returns:
- The ClassAd Record Expression.
Throws:
ClassAdUtilitiesException

doMatch

public boolean doMatch(java.lang.String s1,
                       java.lang.String s2)
                throws ClassAdUtilitiesException
This method returns true if the two strings passed as arguments represent two ClassAd that match.

Parameters:
s1 - , s2 - The strings that represent the ClassAds that are to be matched.
Returns:
- true if s1 and s2 match, false otherwise.
Throws:
ClassAdUtilitiesException

evaluate

public condor.classad.Expr evaluate(java.lang.String sel,
                                    condor.classad.RecordExpr r)
                             throws ClassAdUtilitiesException
This method evaluates the selection in e1, where e2 represents "other".

Parameters:
selection - - The selection, e1 - the RecordExpr where the selection is evaluated e2 - the RecordExpr that represents "other" in the evaluation
Returns:
- boolean if the two values match.
